TopicTitle: World of Warships: Best Video I have found to date of a battleship firing its guns

Articles.Content:
Best Video I have found to date of a battleship firing its guns:

<iframe width="480" height="270" src="https://www.youtube.com/embed/r47ezJUGcKw?feature=oembed" frameborder="0" allowfullscreen="true"></iframe>

Please note, I did not make this video
Never forget the "Crossing the T" maneuver. That is so efficient and hard to screw up.

> 
> Never forget the "Crossing the T" maneuver. That is so efficient and hard to screw up.

Amen...unless, of course, you are driving a Nelson-Class, Dunkirk-Class, or a similar ship in which all your main guns are in the bow of the ship!

> 
> Amen...unless, of course, you are driving a Nelson-Class, Dunkirk-Class, or a similar ship in which all your main guns are in the bow of the ship!

It would still improve efficiency. Supplemental armaments from the stern could then be used.
lol, yeah! You seem to know a lot about naval combat for not being too into it!

My dad...

He came down here recently and took me up north to see the USS North Carolina. He lives there [and everyone thinks I do to for some reason]

My favorite part was the analogue based targeting array. That thing was beautiful!

> 
> My dad...
> He came down here recently and took me up north to see the USS North Carolina. He lives there [and everyone thinks I do to for some reason]
> 
> My favorite part was the analogue based targeting array. That thing was beautiful!

Yeah, the battleship i live closest too, proximity-wise is the USS Iowa and the USS Missouri (across the ocean in Pearl Harbor
Wasn't the USS Missouri referenced in Battleship? I haven't seen that movie in forever. Moral: Never forget that past.
Forget about being mentioned...it was USED in that movie!
Oh seriously!? I need to watch it again! All I remember is epicness.
Yeah, i loved when the mo fired her guns the first time!

Spoilers: It was the Krynn! I'm sure of it! Maybe not, probably not, practically impossible, but still...

Okay it doesn't work.
Nah, don't think it's the Krynn!

Exactly! It's impossible...

Which means I make no sense...
